review: Battlefield 2 is a great classic shooter which i have enjoyed very much in past years. Although now very much outdated by recent shooters and Battlefield games. The modding community is definetely keeping this game alive. Project reality and FH2 are both great mods which I will be playing for a while yet. :D Peace out!
A unique and rewarding experience with a perfect balance of individual skill and teamwork. Keeps you coming for more everytime. 10/10
As a Napoleonic War nut, I have been locked into the Napoleonic War DLC for ages and ages, Lotsa Fun!
